Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.World
      • Game
  • public class Game
extends greenfoot.World
    Benny's Tower Defense in a fun and engaging game to play with (Not Really lol) This is the main world where the different levels will be run on It consists of the statuses of all existing objects
